item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Reverse engineering the Sega Channel game image file format (62 points | 3 comments)

7. Brian Krebs Investigates Internet's Most Vicious Hackers–From a Secret Location (34 points | 2 comments)

13. My second year without a job (501 points | 757 comments)
14. Beekeepers halt honey awards over fraud in global supply chain (180 points | 176 comments)

21. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (288 points | 100 comments)
22. Biggest shell programs (200 points | 102 comments)

26. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (111 points | 77 comments)
27. SQLite Index Visualization: Search (10 points | discuss)
28. Melons and Melancholy: "Eating and Being" illuminates the dynamics of dietetics (12 points | discuss)
29. SpiderBasic (72 points | 31 comments)
30. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (204 points | 49 comments)
